author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-African Rainbow Says To Adopt NAVPS As Performance Measure For Trading Statement ​
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - African Rainbow Capital Investments Ltd :
* AFRICAN RAINBOW CAPITAL INVESTMENTS - TO ADOPT NAVPS AS RELEVANT PERFORMANCE MEASURE FOR TRADING STATEMENT PURPOSES GOING FORWARD​
* ‍AIL WILL NOT OWN A CONTROLLING INTEREST IN MAJORITY OF COMPANIES IN WHICH IT INVESTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
